page.title: 19CULLOMPTON RECREATION
page.content: The Sports Centre,opened in 1985,has a main hall,2 squash courts,weight training room,changing rooms,a bar and coffee bar.People come from as far as{ {Tiverton}and{Exeter.}They have 17 different sports for people of all ages.Some 200 people come each week, squash and badminton being most popular.They would like to add a sauna and swimming pool. Cullompton Community Association provides a motorbike track,B.M.X.track hockey and football pitches and a whippet track.With more money they would have more football pitches and a running track. Other clubs include Guides,Scouts, Majorettes,Army Cadets,St.John's Ambulance,sports clubs and political and voluntary associations.
